ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.impl

Class SessionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.impl.SessionController

  • public class SessionController
extends Object
    Session controller which is created for each open session and holds the doctor.

      • isActivated

        public boolean isActivated()
        Returns:
        true if the session's doctor is activated, false otherwise
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.isActivated(ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)

      • activate

        public void activate(String activationCode)
        Tries to activate the session's doctor with the given activation code. If activation fails, isActivated() still returns false.
        Parameters:
        activationCode - the activation code to use
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.enterActivationCode(String, ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)

      • registerPatient

        public void registerPatient(Patient patient)
                     throws EntityAlreadyExistsException
        Registers a patient.
        Parameters:
        patient - the patient to register
        Throws:
        EntityAlreadyExistsException - if the patient already exists
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.registerPatient(Patient, ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)

      • getPatients

        public Set<Patient> getPatients()
        Returns all patients for the doctor in the database.
        Returns:
        a Set of all doctor's patients
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.getPatients(ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)

      • defineObservationPeriod

        public void defineObservationPeriod(String patientSsn,
                           int deviceId,
                           Date periodStart,
                           Date periodEnd,
                           int measurementIntervalInSeconds)
                             throws EntityNotFoundException,
                                    DeviceAlreadyAssignedBusinessException,
                                    IllegalStateException
        Defines an observation period for the given patient.
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if the patient is not found in the database
        DeviceAlreadyAssignedBusinessException - if the device is already assigned
        IllegalStateException - if there is a device still in test-mode
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.defineObservationPeriod(String, Integer, Date, Date, int, ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session), SessionControllerProxy.defineObservationPeriod(String, Integer, Date, Date, int, ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)

      • testMeasure

        public Measurement testMeasure()
                        throws IllegalStateException
        Perfoms a test measure on the device in test-mode.
        Returns:
        the result of the test-measurement.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there is no device in test-mode
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.testMeasure(ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)

      • endTest

        public void endTest()
             throws IllegalStateException
        Sets the device in test-mode into productive mode and ends the test-phase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there is no device in test-mode
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.endTest(ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)

      • consultMeasurements

        public Set<? extends Measurement> consultMeasurements(String patientId,
                                             Integer periodId,
                                             Date start,
                                             Date end)
                                               throws EntityNotFoundException
        Returns measurements for the given patient or period. Either patientId or periodId have to be null!
        Returns:
        a Set of measurements which were found for the given parameters
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if periodId and patientId are not found in the database
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.consultObservationPeriodMeasurements(Integer, Date, Date, ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session), SessionControllerProxy.consultPatientMeasurements(String, Date, Date, ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)

      • returnDevice

        public void returnDevice(int deviceId)
                  throws EntityNotFoundException,
                         DeviceNotAssignedException
        Returns the given device.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - the id of the device to 'return'.
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if the device is not found in the database
        DeviceNotAssignedException - if the device is not assigned to an observation period.
        See Also:
        SessionControllerProxy.returnDevice(Integer, ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller.Session)
